title: Agriturismo Tenuta Montecorbo - maybe closed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine
description: This estate in Massa Lubrense commune is surrounded by olive groves and lemon trees and covers 17 hectares of land which has been organically certified. Hosts themed weekends with yoga and other activities. There is a set menu and chefs will cook specials daily. The food is mostly Italian with occasional themed nights. Outdoor kids play-area, Wi-Fi. NOTE: maybe closed/shut down, please verify and let HappyCow know.
